entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
